description: "The illustration on this map highlights the wealth of the Asian trade routes, with merchants wearing elaborate robes presenting valuable treasures to a royal figure. A monkey, tortoise and camel emphasise the 'exoticism' of Asia."
title: "Exactissima Asiae delineatio : in praecipuas regiones, ceterasq. partes divisa et denuo in lucem edita per Carolum Allard"
